title: Must Watch: Return of The Goat 2 Premiere rolls out red carpet for 2021 YT Capra
content:
If you already ride a YT, chances are you’ll be safe. If you ride a mountain bike from any other brand, you’d better purchase the 2021 YT Capra 29er or MX right now. The Goat Man has returned, and he’s brought the Goat Fellowship with him. There is no hiding. Prepare to get goated. In […]

The post Must Watch: Return of The Goat 2 Premiere rolls out red carpet for 2021 YT Capra appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
